tool_description: Generate shaped word clouds out of your text easily
name: WordCloudGen
title: WordCloudGen

api_list.name: Create word cloud
api_list.description: Generates word cloud png image of text
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://wordcloudgen.p.rapidapi.com/wcl"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "wordcloudgen.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://wordcloudgen.p.rapidapi.com/wcl"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "wordcloudgen.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
